theColorName.scss

View on GitHub

theColorNames.scss

This library contain a SCSS mixin with all 142 CSS color names:

@mixin tcn($property, $color) {
  #{$property}: #{$color};
}

For example:

.tomato {
  @include tcn(color, $color);
}

Will compile to:

.tomato {
  color: tomato;
}

All 142 colors:
